CheckTitle: Check if AWS WAFv2 WebACL CloudWatch Metrics are enabled
CheckType: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/NIST 800-53 Controls
Description: Check if AWS WAFv2 CloudWatch Metrics are enabled for Web ACLs to monitor and analyze traffic patterns effectively.
Risk: Without CloudWatch Metrics enabled on AWS WAF rules or rule groups, it's challenging to monitor traffic flow effectively. This reduces visibility into potential security threats, such as malicious activities or unusual traffic patterns.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that CloudWatch Metrics are enabled for AWS WAF rules and rule groups. This provides detailed insights into traffic, enabling timely identification of security risks.
